behavior wet_cat(cat: item, bathtub: item):
    body:
        achieve inside(cat, bathtub)
        # Ensure the cat is placed inside the bathtub

def has_faucet(bathtub: item):
    # Determine whether the bathtub has a faucet
    symbol has_faucet=exists faucet: item: is_faucet(faucet) and close(faucet, bathtub)
    return has_faucet

behavior fill_bathtub_with_water(bathtub: item):
    body:
        if has_faucet(bathtub):
            bind faucet: item where:
                is_faucet(faucet) and close(faucet, bathtub)
            achieve_once is_on(faucet)
            achieve has_water(bathtub)
            achieve_once is_off(faucet)

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind cat: item where:
            is_cat(cat)
        # Select the cat

        bind bathtub: item where:
            is_bathtub(bathtub)
        # Select a bathtub

        wet_cat(cat, bathtub)
        fill_bathtub_with_water(bathtub)
        achieve has_water(cat)
        # Ensure the cat is wet

def in_bathroom(item:item):
    # Function to check if an item is in the bathroom
    symbol in_bathroom=exists room: item : is_bathroom(room) and inside(item, room)
    return in_bathroom

behavior place_cat_in_bathtub(cat:item, bathtub:item):
    body:
        achieve inside(cat, bathtub)
        # Place the cat in the bathtub

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind cat: item where:
            is_cat(cat)
        # Select the cat
        
        bind bathroom: item where:
            is_bathroom(bathroom)
        # Select the bathroom
        
        bind bathtub: item where:
            is_bathtub(bathtub) and in_bathroom(bathtub)
        # Select the bathtub in the bathroom
        
        achieve close_char(char, cat)
        # Ensure the character is close to the cat
        
        find_cat(cat)
        touch_cat(cat)
        place_cat_in_bathtub(cat, bathtub)

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind bathtub: item where:
            is_bathtub(bathtub)
        # Select a bathtub

        bind shower: item where:
            is_shower(shower)
        # Select a shower

        bind cat: item where:
            is_cat(cat)
        # Select the cat

        achieve inside(cat, bathtub)
        # Place the cat inside the bathtub

        achieve is_on(shower)
        # Turn on the shower to shower the cat

def is_bathtub(bathtub:item):

def is_cat(cat:item):

behavior place_cat_in_bathtub(cat:item, bathtub:item):

        achieve inside(cat, bathtub) # Place the cat inside the bathtub

behavior __goal__():
